title: Emmerdale spoilers: Dominic Brunt teases Chas and Paddy wedding
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Chas Dingle (Lucy Parteger) and Paddy Kirk (Dominic Brunt) have been through it all over the years, but now it seems as though things are slowly on the up with a new baby on the way. And if that wasn’t enough, they could soon be destined to cement their love by exchanging vows.

Speaking exclusively to Metro.co.uk on the red carpet at Inside Soap Awards, Dominic revealed he’d love to see Paddy and Chas tie the knot. Wouldn’t we all, Dominic?

‘I would like to be a Dingle,’ he told us. ‘I would like to get married and take her name so I would be Paddy Dingle. I would love that, I would die happy. Imagine just being a Dingle, it would be amazing.’

We’re picturing the whole shebang and to see Chaddy get their happily-ever-after would be *everything*.

Dominic, who picked up a gong for Best Partnership for his performance with Lucy, also revealed there’s dramatic scenes around the corner as autumn storylines continue to unfold, including a huge stunt.

Dominic Brunt is game for a Paddy and Chas wedding (Picture: Backgrid)

‘I think the sea’s involved and a boat, underwater shooting and stuff like that,’ he said.

A spokesperson for the soap told Metro.co.uk: ‘Prepare for some serious fireworks in Emmerdale this autumn as Cain, Moira, Nate, Robert, Aaron and Chas all find themselves in hugely life-changing situations.

‘There are explosive scenes as Cain finally discovers that Moira has been having an affair with Nate. And hell hath no fury like a Cain Dingle scorned. Realising the dire circumstances they’re in, Robert and Aaron decide to go on the run from the hefty sentence they fear Robert faces.

‘Amongst the darkness, there’s a ray of light as Chas gives birth to her beautiful baby in true Dingle fashion.’

We can’t wait.
